short.ar: مساعد الذكاء الاصطناعي الشامل لزيادة إنتاجيتك. استخدم الذكاء الاصطناعي التوليدي (ChatGPT، Claude، Gemini) للكتابة والرسم في أي مكان.

short.ru: Мощный всеобъемлющий ИИ-копилот для повышения продуктивности. Используйте генеративный ИИ (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) для работы везде

short.ta: உங்கள் திறனை அதிகரிக்க ஒருங்கிணைந்த AI உதவியாளர். ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini போன்ற ஜெனரேட்டிவ் AI பயன்படுத்தி எழுதுங்கள் மற்றும் ஓவியம்
short.te: మీ ఉత్పాదకతను పెంచే అద్భుతమైన అన్ని-ఒక్కటి AI సహాయకుడు. ఎక్కడైనా రాయడానికి మరియు గీయడానికి జనరేటివ్ AIని ఉపయోగించండి.
short.th: ตัวช่วย AI อเนกประสงค์ช่วยเพิ่มผลผลิต ใช้ AI สร้างสรรค์ (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) เพื่อเขียนและวาดทุกที่
short.tr: Üretkenliğinizi artıran güçlü hepsi bir arada yapay zeka yardımcısı. Yazı ve resim yapmak için üretici AI (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini)
short.uk: Потужний універсальний ШІ-копілот для підвищення продуктивності. Використовуйте генеративний ШІ (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) для роботи
short.vi: Trợ lý AI đa năng giúp tăng năng suất. Sử dụng AI sinh sản (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini) để viết & vẽ mọi nơi.
short.zh_CN: 提升您生产力的强大全能AI副驾驶。使用生成AI（ChatGPT、Claude、Gemini）在任何地方写作与绘画。
short.zh_TW: 功能強大的全能AI副駕駛，提升您的生產力。使用生成式AI（ChatGPT、Claude、Gemini）隨時隨地寫作和繪畫。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Do more with AI – compose and revise 10x faster with Viinyx.

Powerful all-in-one AI copilot to increase your productivity. Use generative AI to write and paint anywhere on the web. Works seamlessly on Gmail, Google Docs, LinkedIn, and many other sites.

✍️ With only a short prompt, command AI to draft emails, write blog posts, create marketing copy, brainstorm ideas, translate text, review essays, etc. 
Use your login sessions for ChatGPT, Claude AI, Gemini and Bing, among others to generate text.

🎨 Generate images for social media posts, images to use on your website, logo designs for your company, illustrations for your book, or images for numerous other purposes.
Use DALL·E, Imagen, Stable Diffusion and various other providers for generating images.

💬 Hit Options (⌥) / Alt + V to start chatting with AI
▶︎ Enter ‘/‘ into the Viinyx chatbox to view your library of saved prompts. 
▶︎ Enable page awareness and web access for more relevant and up-to-date responses.
▶︎ Viinyx saves your chat history locally and syncs it across each tab in real time.
▶︎ Talk to images or alter them using AI.
▶︎ Talk to multiple PDF documents at once

✨ Type // to generate text and images – Unobtrusive AI writing assistant.
▶︎ Compose any kind of text content using your preferred AI providers (API connection to OpenAI, Claude, OpenRouter, etc.)
▶︎ Generate images on Google Docs, Medium, and everywhere else.
▶︎ Generate a quick contextually aware reply to a post, comment, comment reply, or message.
▶︎ Let AI continue where you left off, finishing your draft, with similar tone and style.

🔎 Summarise search results
▶︎ Summarise your search results or get an AI-generated answer to your search query – integrated with Google, Bing, Yahoo and most other major search engines. With this feature, you'll spend less time deciphering complex search results, making your online research a breeze.

🎞️ Summarise a video on any website
▶︎ Get quick summaries of videos of any length on any website. Viinyx is the perfect study companion for Udemy, Coursera and Edx.

🪄 Highlight and modify text in one click
▶︎ Shorten, lengthen, improve grammar, reword and modify text quickly.

🖼️ Reimagine images on the web
▶︎ Leveraging prominent image-generating models like DALL·E, Google Imagen, and Adobe Firefly, Viinyx steps up to reimagine and regenerate images. Revamp images on the web, paint with AI, or create outstanding logos from just text. With Viinyx, churning out captivating concept art and enticing logos becomes natural.

📄 Generate documents at file inputs
▶︎ Create PDFs, Docx, and images on any site just before uploading them. Hit file picker, paste your text or image, choose a format, and there you have it!

Viinyx is your AI-powered web assistant brilliantly designed to sprout creativity and bolster productivity by making your life significantly easier. An extension that brings together the power of robust AI models like GPT-4 and GPT-4o, Anthropic Claude 3, Google Gemini Pro, OpenRouter models, and so much more.

➕ Much More Coming Soon ➕
This is just the beginning. More amazing features are on the horizon to make Viinyx even more integral to your digital journey.

🔐 Privacy
All your configurations, API Keys, browsing and session data, stored documents, and chat history are stored inside your device(s) browser. We do not transfer your data to any remote servers, nor do we sell your data to third parties.

📪 Contact Us
We appreciate your valuable feedback. Please rate our extension and share your experience. For support, guidance, or any queries, feel free to get in touch with us at support@viinyx.com.
long.en:
Do more with AI – compose and revise 10x faster with Viinyx.

Powerful all-in-one AI copilot to increase your productivity. Use generative AI to write and paint anywhere on the web. Works seamlessly on Gmail, Google Docs, LinkedIn, and many other sites.

Access gpt-4o, o1, claude 3.5 chatbots

✍️ With only a short prompt, command AI to draft emails, write blog posts, create marketing copy, brainstorm ideas, translate text, review essays, etc. 
Use your login sessions for ChatGPT, Claude AI, Gemini and Bing, among others to generate text.

🎨 Generate images for social media posts, images to use on your website, logo designs for your company, illustrations for your book, or images for numerous other purposes.
Use DALL·E, Imagen, Stable Diffusion and various other providers for generating images.

💬 Hit Options (⌥) / Alt + V to start chatting with AI
▶︎ Enter ‘/‘ into the Viinyx chatbox to view your library of saved prompts. 
▶︎ Enable page awareness and web access for more relevant and up-to-date responses.
▶︎ Viinyx saves your chat history locally and syncs it across each tab in real time.
▶︎ Talk to images or alter them using AI.
▶︎ Talk to multiple PDF documents at once

✨ Type // to generate text and images – Unobtrusive AI writing assistant.
▶︎ Compose any kind of text content using your preferred AI providers (API connection to OpenAI, Claude, OpenRouter, etc.)
▶︎ Generate images on Google Docs, Medium, and everywhere else.
▶︎ Generate a quick contextually aware reply to a post, comment, comment reply, or message.
▶︎ Let AI continue where you left off, finishing your draft, with similar tone and style.

🔎 Summarise search results
▶︎ Summarise your search results or get an AI-generated answer to your search query – integrated with Google, Bing, Yahoo and most other major search engines. With this feature, you'll spend less time deciphering complex search results, making your online research a breeze.

🎞️ Summarise a video on any website
▶︎ Get quick summaries of videos of any length on any website. Viinyx is the perfect study companion for Udemy, Coursera and Edx.

🪄 Highlight and modify text in one click
▶︎ Shorten, lengthen, improve grammar, reword and modify text quickly.

🖼️ Reimagine images on the web
▶︎ Leveraging prominent image-generating models like DALL·E, Google Imagen, and Adobe Firefly, Viinyx steps up to reimagine and regenerate images. Revamp images on the web, paint with AI, or create outstanding logos from just text. With Viinyx, churning out captivating concept art and enticing logos becomes natural.

📄 Generate documents at file inputs
▶︎ Create PDFs, Docx, and images on any site just before uploading them. Hit file picker, paste your text or image, choose a format, and there you have it!

Viinyx is your AI-powered web assistant brilliantly designed to sprout creativity and bolster productivity by making your life significantly easier. An extension that brings together the power of robust AI models like GPT-4 and GPT-4o, Anthropic Claude 3, Google Gemini Pro, OpenRouter models, and so much more.

➕ Much More Coming Soon ➕
This is just the beginning. More amazing features are on the horizon to make Viinyx even more integral to your digital journey.

🔐 Privacy
All your configurations, API Keys, browsing and session data, stored documents, and chat history are stored inside your device(s) browser. We do not transfer your data to any remote servers, nor do we sell your data to third parties.

📪 Contact Us
We appreciate your valuable feedback. Please rate our extension and share your experience. For support, guidance, or any queries, feel free to get in touch with us at support@viinyx.com.
